    • Constructor Detail

      • University

        public University()

        University

        Description: Constructs a new University object. This constructor initializes the array of collaborators with a fixed size of 1000.

        Preconditions:

        • None: No preconditions.

        Postconditions:

        • A new University object is created with an array of collaborators initialized to a size of 1000.

    • Method Detail

      • registerCollaborator

        public java.lang.String registerCollaborator(int intType,
                                             java.lang.String fullName,
                                             java.lang.String id,
                                             java.lang.String email,
                                             java.lang.String extension)

        registerCollaborator

        Description: Registers a collaborator based on the provided information and type. This method checks for duplicate collaborators with the same ID using the searchCollaborator(String) method. If there is a duplicate collaborator, it returns a message indicating that the collaborator has already been registered. If there is no duplicate, it checks for available space to register a new collaborator using the availableCollaborator() method. If there is no available space, it returns a message indicating that no more collaborators can be registered. If space is available, it creates a new instance of either ImprovementCollaborator or Collaborator based on the provided type. The newly created collaborator is then added to the array of collaborators.

        Preconditions:

        • collaborators array must be initialized.
        • searchCollaborator and availableCollaborator methods should be in place.

        Postconditions:

        • A collaborator is registered based on the provided information and type, and a message indicating the success or failure of the registration is returned.
        Parameters:
        intType - The type of collaborator (1 for DTI, 2 for general).
        fullName - The full name of the collaborator.
        id - The ID of the collaborator.
        email - The email address of the collaborator.
        extension - The extension number of the collaborator.
        Returns:
        A message indicating the success or failure of the registration.

      • searchCollaborator

        public Collaborator searchCollaborator(java.lang.String id)

        searchCollaborator

        Description: Searches for a collaborator with the specified ID. This method iterates through the array of collaborators stored in the university and checks if there is a collaborator with the provided ID. If a collaborator with the matching ID is found, it returns the collaborator object; otherwise, it returns null.

        Preconditions:

        • collaborators array must be initialized.

        Postconditions:

        • The collaborator object with the specified ID, if found, is returned; otherwise, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the collaborator to search for.
        Returns:
        The collaborator object with the specified ID, if found; otherwise, null.

      • availableCollaborator

        public int availableCollaborator()

        availableCollaborator

        Description: Determines the index of the next available slot in the array of collaborators. This method iterates through the array of collaborators stored in the university and returns the index of the first null slot found. If no null slot is found, it returns -1, indicating that there is no available space to register a new collaborator.

        Preconditions:

        • collaborators array must be initialized.

        Postconditions:

        • The index of the next available slot in the array of collaborators, if found; otherwise, -1 is returned.
        Returns:
        The index of the next available slot in the array of collaborators, if found; otherwise, -1.

      • getCollaborators

        public Collaborator[] getCollaborators()

        getCollaborators

        Description: Retrieves the array of collaborators stored in the university.

        Preconditions:

        • collaborators array must be initialized.

        Postconditions:

        • The array of collaborators stored in the university is returned.
        Returns:
        The array of collaborators stored in the university.
